project.name: Bioinformatics Testbench
project.description: Developement of a testbench to analyze the quality of pairwise alignments. In detail the work produced the creation of a tool to visualize the scoring matrices and the creation of a tool to allow the evaluation of the different scoring schemes.

project.name: Mobile application for students
project.description: Several Android apps developed: Lecture TimeTable - Android App for the management of the lectures timetable JobPlacement - Android App to search for a job IntectiveMap - Android App to search for houses and apartments StudentLife - Android App that includes all the services offered the other apps and that allows the sale and the purchase of items
